column4: please my rhythmbox player as an import error which says that additional GStreamer plugins are required to play mp3 files. what can i do
just install the "ubuntu-restricted-extras" in the software centre.
package*
i have installed it
what kind of files are you trying to import
mp3
mp3
hmmm
just to be sure, give in the terminal:  apt-cache policy ubuntu-restricted-extras  and confirm that the Installed section shows the installed version.
!ot | gordonjcp
Installed:57 Candidate57 Version table:*** 57  0 that was what came out
could you paste the whole output on paste.ubuntu.com
its at paste.ubuntu.com/1359284/
hmm that's strange. how did you install the package? do you remember?
i downloaded the deb file and i ran sudo dpkg -i packagename in the terminal
what didn't you install it using the software centre?
i was finding it difficult getting connected to the internet on ubuntu
are you connected now?
yes
good, then

then, my suggestion is:  remove the local version and install the one from the repos, i.e. give the following in the terminal, it's one command: sudo apt-get purge ubuntu-restricted-extras && sudo apt-get install ubuntu-restricted-extras
actually, no, better give this:
sudo apt-get purge ubuntu-restricted-extras && sudo apt-get clean && sudo apt-get install ubuntu-restricted-extras
